Two RSA users reused a prime while encrypting their secrets. Can you recover the messages from this shared-prime mistake? Ciphertext: 6174846236340404518340878211660746692714238399458377000681080511561938593398466862661967000158883048635977338863355628341236162238070307413179327246004061

The flag format is flag{...}
n=8325989068196456371390641860781005770204463082006779879531094029599592220690218140169669124611489246314011632886342376472844536827860687451350462775421509, n2=11055119554398974656381130484432785306776343660793925654173727227169106639167474488469997960060066699052949900021302515560267973909102985498629200557801781, e=6210113491452039645738731233038294861771858413752650234635841291606323608131625810703864625627613315138690676578599181252636961145347796644894883447594383

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{g3dfvbo1}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 6174846236340404518340878211660746692714238399458377000681080511561938593398466862661967000158883048635977338863355628341236162238070307413179327246004061
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=8325989068196456371390641860781005770204463082006779879531094029599592220690218140169669124611489246314011632886342376472844536827860687451350462775421509, n2=11055119554398974656381130484432785306776343660793925654173727227169106639167474488469997960060066699052949900021302515560267973909102985498629200557801781, e=6210113491452039645738731233038294861771858413752650234635841291606323608131625810703864625627613315138690676578599181252636961145347796644894883447594383
extra_info: p=114005003738520818538305501684828065540860699948430721870507195664773821022981, q=73031786282756045245970965654931647960659931893111916889124740829316907380289, q2=96970476662188753749445902007782955967622097458233963777455078492270693874801, φ(n)=8325989068196456371390641860781005770204463082006779879531094029599592220690031103379647847747704969846671873172840855841002994189101055514856372047018240, φ(n2)=11055119554398974656381130484432785306776343660793925654173727227169106639167263512989597250487778947649257288999794032762861309223455023224472156042904000
